Nerved of all the cms systems out there where you need Days to understand templating or even the cms?

  • With us you can build your template in 10 minutes
  • You handle the cms like a Pro after a 5 Minute Tutorial

<!-- Gives the Menu "MAIN_MENU",-->
<!-- mainMenuHandle see the menu.php -->
<!-- it goes through all menus and writes an ul bases nav--> 
<?php echo getMenu("MAIN_MENU","mainMenuHandle") ?>

<!-- Gives you the page title -->
<?php echo getTitle() ?>

<!-- Gives you all page contents -->
<?php echo getContents() ?>
